LongName: Matrix Elements for the Double beta decay Experiments
Info: The MEDEX conference is dedicated to presenting different methods of nuclear matrix elements (NMEs) calculations in connection with the nuclear double beta decay processes. It brings together theorists and experimentalists. Several collaborators (Ivan
column13: Jouni) are on the organizing commitee.

Info: One of the biggest underground physics conferences held every two years. Last time we had a parallel talk (typically given by more senior collaborator and a couple of posters.
